Homicide Rap For Tesla Driver On Autopilot
APRIL 26--A Tesla owner has been charged with vehicular homicide after his car--traveling in autopilot mode--slammed into a motorcyclist when he got distracted looking at his cellphone, according to
www.thesmokinggun.com
When are they going to force Tesla to eliminate that feature?
